suggestions.before:

suggestions.section_advice: Use consistent formatting for bullet points in the Experience section.

suggestions.change: Add industry-specific keywords to the Summary section
suggestions.before: Computer Science and Engineering undergraduate with hands-on experience inbackend development, systems programming, IoT, and government IT operations.
suggestions.after: Experienced Computer Science and Engineering graduate with expertise in backend development, systems programming, IoT, and government IT operations, leveraging Python and Streamlit for data analysis.
suggestions.section_advice: Tailor your Summary to highlight industry-specific keywords and showcase relevant skills.

suggestions.change: Specify technical expertise in the Skills section
suggestions.before:
- Languages:Python, C, Java, SQL, JavaScript, NASM Assembly
- Backend & Systems:Node.js, TypeScript, Express.js, Spring Boot, REST APIs
suggestions.after:
- Programming languages: Python (with Streamlit), Java, JavaScript, and NASM Assembly
- Backend technologies: Node.js, TypeScript, Express.js, Spring Boot, and REST APIs
suggestions.section_advice: Break down technical skills into more specific categories for better clarity.

suggestions.change: Remove unnecessary words and phrases from the Education section
suggestions.before:
- Government Engineering College, Kannur2024 – Present B.Tech – Computer Science and Engineering
- Relevant coursework: Data Structures, OOP, DBMS, Operating Systems
suggestions.after: - Government Engineering College, Kannur2024 – Present B.Tech – Computer Science and Engineering
suggestions.section_advice: Focus on essential details in the Education section.

suggestions.change: Use a more professional tone in the Summary section
suggestions.before: Professional Summary Computer Science and Engineering undergraduate with hands-on experience inbackend development, systems programming, IoT, and government IT operations.
suggestions.after: Highly motivated and results-driven Computer Science and Engineering graduate with extensive experience in backend development, systems programming, IoT, and government IT operations.
suggestions.section_advice: Use a professional tone to convey confidence and enthusiasm for the role.
